title: I was bad in math. Now I'm in my 70's Can I still learn a lot of math, even advanced math? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Every deep thinker is more afraid of being understood than of being misunderstood.” ― Friedrich Neitzsche The only reason why mathematics is as complex as it is. The enemy of learning math isn’t inelligence, age or talent it’s impatience!
